Title: Measuring the weak value of momentum in a double slit atom interferometer
Abstract: © Published under licence by IOP Publishing Ltd.We describe the development of an experiment to measure the weak value of the transverse momentum operator (local momentum [1]) of cold atoms passing through a matter- wave interferometer. The results will be used to reconstruct the atom's average trajectories. We describe our progress towards this goal using laser cooled argon atoms.
